entry.title: Java
entry.content:
#include <iostream>#include <cstring>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 1010;int a[N][N];int n, m, k;int s[N][N];int main(){    cin >> n >> m >> k;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {            cin >> a[i][j];        }    }    for (int i = 1; i <=n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {           s[i][j] = a[i][j] + s[i - 1][j] + s[i][j - 1] - s[i - 1][j - 1];        }    }    while (k --) {        int x1, y1, x2, y2;        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;        cout << s[x2][y2] - s[x1 - 1][y2] - s[x2][y1 - 1] + s[x1 - 1][y1 - 1] << endl;    }    return 0;}
